mapper.sql: SELECT g.id , g.goods_code , g.img_id , imgs.url , g.name , g.slogan , g.price , g.discount , g.score , g.size , g.color

LEFT JOIN third_level_type AS lev3 ON lev3.`id` = g.`third_level_id` LEFT JOIN second_level_type AS lev2 ON lev2.`id` = lev3.`second_level_id` LEFT JOIN first_level_type AS lev1 ON lev1.`id` = lev2.`first_level_id`
mapper.select:
, lev3.id AS lev3_id , lev3.name AS lev3_name , lev2.id AS lev2_id , lev2.name AS lev2_name , lev1.id AS lev1_id , lev1.name AS lev1_name FROM goods AS g LEFT JOIN imgs ON imgs.`id` = g.`img_id`
ORDER BY lev1.`id`, lev2.`id`, lev3.`id`, g.`id`

SELECT lev3.`id` AS 'lev3_id' , lev3.`name` AS 'lev3_name' , lev2.`id` AS 'lev2_id' , lev2.`name` AS 'lev2_name' , lev1.`id` AS 'lev1_id' , lev1.`name` AS 'lev1_name' FROM third_level_type AS lev3 RIGHT JOIN second_level_type AS lev2 ON lev2.`id` = lev3.`second_level_id` RIGHT JOIN first_level_type AS lev1 ON lev1.`id` = lev2.`first_level_id` ORDER BY lev1.`id`, lev2.`id`, lev3.`id`

, lev1.`id` AS 'lev1_id' , lev1.`name` AS 'lev1_name' FROM goods AS g LEFT JOIN imgs ON imgs.`id` = g.`img_id`
ORDER BY lev1.`id`, g.`id`

, lev2.`id` AS 'lev2_id' , lev2.`name` AS 'lev2_name' FROM goods AS g LEFT JOIN imgs ON imgs.`id` = g.`img_id`
ORDER BY lev2.`id`, g.`id`

, lev3.`id` AS 'lev3_id' , lev3.`name` AS 'lev3_name' FROM goods AS g LEFT JOIN imgs ON imgs.`id` = g.`img_id`
ORDER BY lev3.`id`, g.`id`
